fields.label: Header Tags
fields.name: header_tags
fields.instructions: Enter any tags that go before the <head> tag here.

fields.label: Body Tags
fields.name: body_tags
fields.instructions: Enter any tags that go immediately after the <body> tag here.

fields.label: Footer Tags
fields.name: footer_tags
fields.instructions: Enter any tags that go in the <footer> tag here.

fields.label: Feature options
fields.name: feature_options
fields.instructions: Choose from the following options to feature a video, slider, or image. If using an image be sure to set the Featured Image for the page.

fields.label: Feature Video BG
fields.name: feature_video_bg
fields.instructions: This image will show before the video loads

sub_fields.label: Compact
sub_fields.name: compact
sub_fields.instructions: Optional: Tick if you'd like the content to appear in a compact container.

sub_fields.label: Align Content
sub_fields.name: align_content
sub_fields.instructions: Optional: align the content within the container
